edge: Darsheel Safary portrays the character of Ishaan Nandkishore Awasthi in the movie.
Veer Mohan plays the role of young Ishaan in the movie.
Aamir Khan portrays the character of Ram Shankar Nikumbh, an art teacher at New Era High School and Ishaan's tutor in the movie.
Tisca Chopra acts as Maya Nandkishore Awasthi, Nandkishore's wife and Yohaan's and Ishaan's mother in the movie.
Vipin Sharma plays the role of Nandkishore Awasthi, Maya's husband and Yohaan's and Ishaan's father in the movie.
Sachet Engineer portrays the character of Yohaan Nandkishore Awasthi, Nandkishore's and Maya's first son and Ishaan's elder brother in the movie.
Aniket Engineer plays the role of young Yohaan in the movie.
Tanay Chheda acts as Rajan Damodran, Ishaan's best friend and classmate at New Era High School in the movie.
Ramit Gupta portrays the character of Ranjeet in the movie.
Girija Oak acts as Jabeen Khan, Ram's co-worker in the movie.
Bugs Bhargava portrays the character of Sen Sir in the movie.
Shankar Sachdev acts as Tiwari Sir in the movie.

node_2: principal of new era high school
edge: M. K. Raina portrays the character of Principal of New Era High School in the movie.
Pratima Kulkarni acts as Principal of St. Anthony's School in the movie.
Meghna Malik portrays the character of Victoria Teacher, class teacher and mathematics teacher of Ishaan's former school, St. Anthony's School in the movie.

node_2: ishaan's former school, st. anthony's school
edge: Meghna Malik served as Victoria Teacher, class teacher and mathematics teacher at Ishaan's former school, St. Anthony's School.
Sonali Sachdev worked as Irene Teacher at St. Anthony's school.
